metadata.title: The next big threat to global health? 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV): What advice can we give to travellers? – Interim recommendations January 2020, from the Latin-American society for Travel Medicine (SLAMVI)

introduction: The next big threat to global health? 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV): What advice can we give to travellers? – Interim recommendations January 2020, from the Latin-American society for Travel Medicine (SLAMVI)

summary: The big threat to global health? 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV): What advice can the authors give to travellers? – Interim recommendations January 2020, from the Latin-American society for Travel Medicine (SLAMVI).
